targets.query:
from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "home" or r["_field"] == "solar" or r["_field"] == "grid" or r["_field"] == "powerwall" or r["_field"] ==  "backup_reserve_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "percentage")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r._value / 0.95) - 5.0 / 0.95 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "raw_weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "clouds" or r["_field"] == "feels_like" or r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

options.content: Firmware

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: min, createEmpty: false)

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "home")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "solar")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "home" or r._field == "from_grid")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), powered: (r.home - r.from_grid) / r.home}))

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "to_powerwall")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "to_grid")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "from_grid")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "grid")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "from_powerwall" or r["_field"] == "solar" or r["_field"] == "to_powerwall" or r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> sum()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_measurement"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with p_h: r.from_powerwall * ${kWhCost}}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with s_h: (r.solar - (r.to_powerwall + r.to_grid)) * ${kWhCost}}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with s_g: (r.to_grid) * ${kWhCost}}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with total: (r.p_h + r.s_h + r.s_g)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "blank": (" ")}))
  |> drop(columns: ["from_powerwall", "to_powerwall", "to_grid", "solar"])

import "math"

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "instant_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "solar" or r._field == "to_grid" or r._field == "to_powerwall" or r._field == "from_powerwall" or r._field == "from_grid")
  |> integral()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 3600.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), from_solar: ((r.solar) - (r.to_grid) - (r.to_powerwall)), from_powerwall: r.from_powerwall, from_grid: r.from_grid}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with solar: (1.0 + r.from_solar / math.abs(x: r.from_solar)) * r.from_solar / 2.0 }))
  |> drop(columns: ["from_solar"])

patterns.name: Home
patterns.transform_values:
Exporting
_value_
| Idle | Importing
_value_

patterns.name: Battery
patterns.transform_values:
Charging
_value_
| Idle | Discharging
_value_

targets.query:
from(bucket: "raw_tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_instant_power" or r["_field"] == "load_instant_power" or r["_field"] == "site_instant_power" or r["_field"] == "solar_instant_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "year", "host", "month", "url"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))

import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "America/Los_Angeles")

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "home")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)

  |> range(start: -1y, stop: now())

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "America/Los_Angeles")

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Monthly Average"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 15d, from: r._time)}))

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "America/Los_Angeles")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /[A-D][0-99]_Voltage/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vitals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /ISLAND_Freq/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= 1.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vitals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PW1_PINV_Fout")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vitals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /ISLAND_VL[0-3].*/ or r["_field"] =~ /PW[0-99]_PINV_VSplit[1-2]/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= 1.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pods")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /PW[1-99]_POD_nom_full_pack_energy/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= 1.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pods")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /PW[1-99]_POD_nom_energy_remaining/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= 1.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tesla_energy")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alerts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: min, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "host", "month", "url", "year"])

from(bucket: "raw_weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "feels_like" or r["_field"] == "humidity" or r["_field"] == "temperature" or r["_field"] == "clouds")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "raw_weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pressure" or r["_field"] == "wind_gust" or r["_field"] == "wind_speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "raw_weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rain_1h" or r["_field"] == "snow_1h")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.0393701}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

list.name: kWhCost
